title: This Shouldn’t Be Happening!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Dia-senpai, have you been using the app that Kasumin recommended?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>That’s because they made it so easy to take so many cute pictures with it! Shizuko and Kasumin take pictures with it every day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Speaking of which, Kasumi-san, do you know about this app?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Huh? Which one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>This one. You can select pictures, and it’ll make a video for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Huh!? There’s an app like this!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>It’s really fun to use, so I thought Kasumi-san would like to try using it too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu. Let me know if you find any more good apps.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
